Desc.eng: Oh, the fabled guest of the Hunter Games! Armed to teeth, leaving a trail of bodies...
The Boiler Apparatus has to go down.
I think our Domovoy friend can handle the problem.
I'm not going to shut down the whole island by destroying the Apparatus.
I refuse to go on an adventure for your lost underwear. I will not collect five rare species of sewer rats either.
So you are not interested in destroying the Boiler Apparatus? The Mad Ringmaster's pride, which is drowning the Dark Carnival in yellow slime?
Is that the same Apparatus that is powering the island?
It is. And the Ringmaster is forcing us to eat this yellow goo. It's a mixture of porridge, polluted river water, and dead people. Anybody opposing his rule.
Porridge of the Dead, you say? He must had a lot of opposition.
The Ringmaster is truly a monster. Let me consider.
